foodItems.name: Hamburger
foodItems.desc: A classic fast food sandwich with a ground beef patty served between buns.

foodItems.name: Pizza
foodItems.desc: Italian dish with a dough base topped with tomato sauce, cheese, and various toppings, baked in an oven.

foodItems.name: Sushi
foodItems.desc: Japanese dish made with vinegared rice and a variety of ingredients like raw seafood, vegetables, and fruits.

foodItems.name: Tacos
foodItems.desc: Traditional Mexican dish consisting of a tortilla filled with seasoned meats, cheese, lettuce, and salsa.

foodItems.name: Salad
foodItems.desc: A dish made with mixed vegetables, greens, and other ingredients, often served as a side or main course.
